programme.title: Hei, Kutsa
programme.desc: Oravad hakkavad koguma kõike, mis neile rõõmu teeb.

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Riittal ja Tomil on käes aasta viimane päev järvel. Sanna ja Antti on jänesejahil. Manu testib põhjapõdrajahil uut abivahendit. Riikka koer Hippu pannakse ajujahil proovile.

programme.title: Loomade salaelu
programme.desc: Chesteri elevandimajas leiab aset tragöödia - pere on nakatunud viirusesse, mis võib saatuslikuks saada. Kõige enam on ohus pere noorimad liikmed ja loomaaia arstid pingutavad haiguse seljatamise nimel kõvasti. Sel nädalal tutvustatakse omavahel isaseid ja emaseid sebrasid, et ohustatud liik kauaoodatud lisa saaks. Uurime kummaliste paljastuhnurite elu, kelle 30-pealist tööliste impeeriumit juhib uut pesakonda ootav raudne leedi.

programme.title: Ajalugu viie minutiga
The fall of the Berlin Wall, 1989
Plekktrumm
programme.desc: USA-st pärit bluusimuusika väljendab mõneti sarnaselt vanadele eesti rahvalauludele inimeste argikogemust, nende muresid ja igatsusi. Millist võimalust pakub bluus oma sisemiste hirmude ja kõhklustega toimetulekuks ühele eesti muusikule? "Plekktrummi" külaline on äsja USA-st Mississippi-äärsetelt bluusi lätetelt naasnud muusik Kaisa Ling. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma, toimetaja Hedi Rosma, režissöör Maire Radsin, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Suursaadik
programme.desc: Samal ajal kui suursaadik üritab sõna NKR-i projekti muuta, õpetab Ida Axelit karmim olema. Välisminister saabub Mehhikosse pakkumisega, mis võib Tiina Washingtoni suursaadikuks viia.

programme.title: Elmo Nüganen. Kuues käik
programme.desc: Teatri- ja filmilavastaja Elmo Nüganen tähistas veebruaris oma 60. sünnipäeva. Pikemas intervjuus uurime, kas selles eluetapis on vabakutselisus inspireeriv või hirmutav, kas uus algus on kuuekümnesena võimalik ja milline on olnud teekond „Kolmest apelsinist“ Melchiorini. Elmost kui õpetajast, kolleegist, sõbrast ja lähedasest inimesest räägivad Priit Võigemast, Piret Kalda, Anne Reemann ja mitmed teised kaasteelised. Saatejuht Margit Kilumets, režissöör Helen Valkna.

programme.title: Teel jalgpalli MM-ile
programme.desc: Lähenevate Katari maailmameistrivõistluste eel saame lähemalt tuttavaks seal mängivate meeskondade ja nende tähtmängijatega.(n)

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Riittal ja Tomil on käes aasta viimane päev järvel. Sanna ja Antti on jänesejahil. Manu testib põhjapõdrajahil uut abivahendit. Riikka koer Hippu pannakse ajujahil proovile.(n)

programme.title: Orlando
programme.desc: Suurejooneline ja fantastiline lugu noore androgüünse aristokraadi seiklustest 17. sajandil. Pärast kummalist kohtumist kuninganna Elizabeth I-ga suundub Orlando seikluslikule rännakule, kus ta komistab viljatule armastusele ning proovib kätt luules ja poliitikas. Virginia Woolfi 1928. aastal ilmunud klassikalisele romaanile tuginedes on režissöör Sally Potteri film maiuspala nii silmale kui ka vaimule. 1992. aastal esilinastunud linateost peetakse ajastutruuks kostüümifilmiks, mis avas tee Tilda Swintonile. Film esitati kahele Oscarile.(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Malawi külas pakutakse müügiks püütoneid, mis oli hea müügiartikkel veel üsna hiljuti, kui siin käis teid ehitamas hulk hiinlasi. Järgmine söögiks pakutav toit on õlis praetud lendsipelgad. Keeldume kategooriliselt mõlemast ja jätkame teekonda tühja kõhuga. Aafrikas seiklesid Peeter Vähi ja Tiina Jokinen.(n)

programme.title: Lahutus Eesti moodi
programme.desc: Ettevõtjast Laura (Liina Vahtrik) tahab lahutada üle 20 aasta kestnud abielu oma muusikaõpetajana töötavast mehest Akslist (Jan Uuspõld), sest nad on totaalselt lahku kasvanud. Mees on vinguv konservatiiv, naine aga kunstnikuhingega liberaal. Kõik nende tõekspidamised on justkui vastandid, nad ei leia enam pisemateski asjades ühist keelt. Laura ja Aksel lähevad suhtenõustaja juurde, kes koostab neile kümnest ülesandest koosneva humaanse lahutusplaani. Esimeses osas peavad Laura ja Aksel taaslooma oma kõige esimese kohtumise. Naljakasse tegevusse sekkuvad nii poeg kui ka tütar ja samuti pöörased naabrid Tauno (Ago Anderson) ning Mirjam (Marilyn Jurman). Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissöör Ergo Kuld.(n)

programme.title: Koomikud ja küsimused
programme.desc: Kõige lõbusam viktoriin teleekraanil! Punkte jagatakse nii õige vastuse kui ka humoorika mõttekäigu eest. Igas saates on ka kaks külalist, kes annavad oma panuse punktide kogumisse.(n)

programme.title: Usalda mind, ma olen arst
programme.desc: Michael Mosley ja ta uudishimulikud tohtrid loovad taas segaduses selgust. Kas kehalisele ja vaimsele tervisele tuleks kasuks lisatund looduses? Mis on salapärane haigus, mis võib lapse isiksust üleöö muuta? Mida teeb peidetud salarasv? Kas trendikas taimepiim on tervisele parem kui ehtne ja palju muud.(n)

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Kirjandusministri juures
programme.desc: Mart Juur viib läbi meeleolukad vestlused meie tuntud kirjanikega.(n)

programme.title: Hulkurid
Stray
programme.desc: "Hulkurid" pakub võimaluse heita pilgu peremeheta ringiuitavate koerte igapäeva. Lavastaja Elizabeth Lo järgneb kaameraga peamiselt kolmele Türgi suurimas linnas ulualust otsivale neljakäpalisele. Neid võiks nimetada kodutuiks, ent õigupoolest on nende koduks kogu Instanbul. Linna tänavaid täitvate koertega on võimud pidanud julma lahingut juba enam kui sajandi jooksul, ent loomade tapmise vastased protestid tõid kaasa seadusemuudatuse, mille kohaselt on kodutute koerte eutaneerimine või vangistamine keelatud. Enim ekraaniaega on tänavakoer Zeytini päralt, kellest on kujunenud kohalike tänavalaste lemmikloom. Nunnut perefilmi siit aga oodata ei maksa – koerte pilgu ja koos nendega kaamerasilma ette jääv linnas lokkav sotsiaalne ebavõrdsus, meeleavaldused ja mahajäetud hoonetes liimi nuusutavad lapsed. "Hulkurid" keerabki peegli tagasi vaataja suunas, küsides, kas ja kui palju paremad me õigupoolest oma neljakäpalistest kaaslastest oleme. Tänavakaadreid katkestavad mitmed ajaloost pärit tsitaadid, kõige sagedamini Antiik-Kreeka filosoofilt Diogeneselt, kes mahitab koertele mitte ülalt alla vaatama, vaid neilt õppima.(n)

programme.title: Teel jalgpalli MM-ile
programme.desc: Saatesari tutvustab Kataris toimuvate maailmameistrivõistlustele jõudnud 32 finalisti.(n)

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: A modern copy of the classic tale of "Snow White". The film tells the story of an evil Queen (Roberts) who takes control of a kingdom, and an exiled princess (Collins) who asks the help of seven rebels to win back her royal life.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The intelligence of mankind has reached an unimaginable level. A private company created a robot in the form of a child called David, which is adopted by a family that almost lost their child because of his illness. A strong bond between David and his mother Monica develops. But all of this soon turned into a handful of complications after Monica's son healed and returned home.

programme.title: Victoria and Abdul
programme.desc: An unusual friendship between the Queen and a young Indian employee occurs.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: INTERPOL officer Louis and his assistant Elinor discover that the leaders of the largest banks of the year have corrupted their branches in many countries, involving them in arms smuggling, money laundering and destabilizing governments in order to make as much money as possible, forcing them to travel for many countries in order to gather evidence to convict the leaders of that bank.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt former CIA operative Bryan Mills when the father of one of the kidnappers he killed to rescue his daughter Kim comes after him and his family. With Bryan and his ex-wife captured, it's up to Kim to help her father escape his captors and save her mother.

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a Special Forces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: After a failed attempt to take down the legendary driver and dangerous prisoner Frankenstein, a Black Ops specialist decides to enter the prison and join the illegal Death Race in order to get rid of Frankenstein.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: On the eve of the fall of the Berlin wall, spy Lorraine Broughton goes on a mission to bring down the spy network that killed an undercover agent for an unknown reason.

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a Special Forces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt former CIA operative Bryan Mills when the father of one of the kidnappers he killed to rescue his daughter Kim comes after him and his family. With Bryan and his ex-wife captured, it's up to Kim to help her father escape his captors and save her mother.

programme.title: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Christopher, a star student and athlete, graduates from Emory University, and decides to go to Alaska to live in the wilderness, after giving up his entire savings to charity. He goes on a journey of self-discovery, meeting several people along the way.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny (Adam Sandler) decides to take his family back to his hometown where he grew up with his friends, and throughout the film, Lenny and his friends believe their kids are still children, but they eventually accept the idea that they have grown up and learn from them.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: A Women lives near-perfect life: marriage is great, children precede her age, home of breathtaking view, but the progress of her career is frustrating, even though she works double effort, and highly committed, with all the frustrations she faces, she is about to reach the point of explosion, which get her forming an alliance with a group of other mothers to overcome all their routine lives.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: Amy, Kiki, and Carla are three under-appreciated and over-burdened mothers who are trying to cope with their lives when their scary mothers come to visit them for Christmas, bringing the three of them into a new challenge to celebrate Christmas the way they prefer.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: To save the company's budget, a CEO, Carol Vanstone, decides to shut down the branch run by her brother, Clay. Trying to save his company, Clay throws an epic Christmas party in an attempt to win over a financially powerful, possible partner, but things spiral out of control.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: After a failed attempt to take down the legendary driver and dangerous prisoner Frankenstein, a Black Ops specialist decides to enter the prison and join the illegal Death Race in order to get rid of Frankenstein.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted
programme.desc: As bank robbers take a number of hostage at the US Federal Reserve, an FBI agent and an NYPD negotiator join forces to diffuse the situation and reach the hostages before the 10-hour siege takes a turn for the worst.(n)

programme.title: American Dreamz
programme.desc: Martin is a presenter for an American talent show, and as a new season begins, he prepares plenty of surprises throughout, including the appearance of the President as a judge. However, the President is suffering from depression, and seems uninterested in participating on the show.(n)

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.(n)

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: When a veteran pilot, Whip Whitaker, miraculously lands a nose-diving plane and saves nearly everyone on board, he is instantly lauded as an American hero. An official investigation into the mid-flight disaster, however, unveils the pilot's rampant alcoholism, jeopardizing his career and credibility.(n)

programme.title: Leave No Trace
programme.desc: A father and his 13 year old daughter lead an all perfect life, residing at this huge park, surrounded by natural beauty; one small mistake turns their green paradise into a living hell.(n)

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: The film tells the story of Jack (Tremblay), a boy at the age of 5 years, who lives in his mother's love and sincere care (Larsson) which is developed in unusual circumstances, where the two of them are trapped in a place does not exceed an area of only a few meters, which refers by his mother to the word (The Room), where Jack's mother has created a parallel universe inside it, but curiosity began to grow inside (Jack) about everything surrounding him, whereupon he develops a risky plan to escape this universe.(n)

programme.title: xXx: State of the Union
programme.desc: (Darius Stone), a new agent for xXx program, is sent to Washington DC to defuse the power struggle between national leaders.

programme.desc: Born to a human father and an Atlantean mother, Arthur Curry is forced to step into his role as heir to Atlantis to prevent war from breaking out between the two worlds he belongs to.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.

programme.title: A-X-L
programme.desc: A robotic dog is manufactured to protect soldiers in the future, but when an experiment goes wrong, (Miles) discovers this dog and together they develop a special friendship that makes the robot go with him everywhere and protect him from any danger.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, Roland Deschain fights with everything he has to prevent his enemy, the Man in Black, from bringing down a structure that preserves reality. With the Man in Black trying to use psychic children to unleash darkness, Roland takes one of them in to save both him and the world.

programme.title: Stockholm
programme.desc: The strange yet true story of the notorious hostage situation that took place in 1973 Stockholm.

programme.desc: A semi-reformed art thief reassembles his old team to pull off one last heist, but his plan goes haywire when his deceitful brother develops his own agenda.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Born to a human father and an Atlantean mother, Arthur Curry is forced to step into his role as heir to Atlantis to prevent war from breaking out between the two worlds he belongs to.

programme.desc: Based on a true story about Florence Foster Jenkins, a wealthy New York woman who has been performing with her husband for years. programme.desc: The film chronicles the life story of the iconic Dalida, born in Cairo and spending her life among different cities and singing in different tongues. Besides having a charming voice, she is starred in Youssef Chahine's The Sixth Day.

programme.desc: The once all-embracing Iranian society turns into a less accepting hell, with a revolution on the horizon threatening to send a Jewish family away from the prosperous existence they have carved out in Iran.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice

programme.title: Dalida
programme.desc: The film chronicles the life story of the iconic Dalida, born in Cairo and spending her life among different cities and singing in different tongues. Besides having a charming voice, she is starred in Youssef Chahine's The Sixth Day.(n)

programme.title: Septembers of Shiraz
programme.desc: The once all-embracing Iranian society turns into a less accepting hell, with a revolution on the horizon threatening to send a Jewish family away from the prosperous existence they have carved out in Iran.(n)

programme.title: Skiptrace
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective and an American gambler form a team to hunt down a Chinese criminal.(n)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: Johnny English comes out of retirement and goes on a new mission that requires overcoming the challenges of modern technology in order to track down the mastermind behind a cyber-attack.(n)

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mitch Buchannon, a devoted life guard who butts heads with a new recruit, as they uncover a crime that could threaten the future of the bay.(n)

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Mike (Jesse Eisenberg) an indifferent young man who lives in a quiet city with his girlfriend Phoebe (Kristen Stewart) . He spends most of his time getting high, but all that changes when the government decides to target Mike for termination.(n)

programme.title: Goon
programme.desc: Doug has always been the odd one out in his brainiac family. When a random incident gives him the chance to join a minor league hockey team, he takes it, even though he doesn't even know how to skate. It's now his turn to beat the odds and lead his new team to a win.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Accountant Calvin Joyner and Bob Stone ,are old schoolmates who reconnect through Facebook. But Calvin suddenly finds himself lured into the world of espionage and collecting information with its various dangers.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Two divers are living a quiet life, but a treasure hunt gets them into trouble with a drug lord after they come upon a missing cargo in a sunken plane.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Jimmy Tong is a cab driver, who with the help of a secretary, gets a job as CIA agent Clark's chauffeur. Clark is then the victim of an assassination attempt, and asks Jimmy to wear his tuxedo.

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel meet each other through a mysterious phone call from a woman they've never met, threatening their lives and pushing them into a chain of risky situations by using modern technology and carefully monitoring their movements.

programme.title: Blown Away
programme.desc: Bomb expert Jimmy Dove (Jeff Bridges) works for the Boston bomb squad. He decides to leave the field to become a teacher to new members. Then he discovers his former partner's death with a bomb. Jimmy begins to search for the truth behind the man responsible.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: The Irish lady, Deirdre, forms a team of specialized mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase from dangerous criminals. After they successfully complete the mission, the suitcase gets switched by a member of the team who wants to sell it to the Russians.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss, dragging Nick into the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Eagle Eye

programme.title: Divergent

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost turns out to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is agent Matt Weston (Ryan Reynolds) who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. They must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they get to another safe house.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Set in the year 2415, a deadly pathogenic virus has killed 99% of the Earth's population. Æon Flux is a mysterious assassin and a member of The Monicans, a secret group aiming to overthrow the government. After a mission to destroy a surveillance station, Æon comes home to find her sister Una has been mistaken for a Monican and killed. When Æon is sent on a mission to kill the government's leader, Trevor Goodchild, she discovers that both she and the Monicans are being manipulated by council members in a secret coup.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: When she is forcibly made into a drug mule for the mafia, Lucy's situation takes a turn for the worse when the new drug she is smuggling inside her body leaks into her bloodstream. When the drug ends up giving her extraordinary powers, Lucy goes after those who put her in that predicament.

programme.title: Derailed
programme.desc: Charles is a married executive who meets Lucinda and has an affair with her. When a dangerous criminal named LaRoche finds out about them ,he blackmails them, turning their lives into hell.

programme.title: Navy Seals
programme.desc: During a rescue mission, Navy Lieutenant Curran learns that things are more complicated than he thought, as the terrorists he and his team are up against have gotten nuclear weapons.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(n)

programme.title: Terminator: Genisys
programme.desc: When John Connor, Human Resistance leader, launches a final attack on Skynet (a global artificial intelligence operating system called "Genisys" leading a machines' rise against mankind), Skynet sends a T-800 Terminator to 1987 to kill Sarah, John's mother. Kyle, John's right-hand man, follows the T-800 and Sarah re-programmes it into "Pops" to form a team in a deadly adventure to destroy Genisys.(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: Tris and Four make the hard decision to leave their home behind in an attempt to find a way to save Chicago from turmoil. However, they end up being taken to a city of hidden secrets where they end up learning the backstory of how their world became what it is.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To foil a terrorist plot by ruthless criminal Castor Troy, FBI Special Agent Sean Archer agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique.(n)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) a former professional assassin,whose peaceful life is disturbed when a thief breaks into his house, steals his car, and kills his dog. He seeks revenge on this thief, and discovers that his father is a Russian gang leader, who sets a reward for those who kill John.(n)

programme.title: Terminator: Genisys
programme.desc: When John Connor, Human Resistance leader, launches a final attack on Skynet (a global artificial intelligence operating system called "Genisys" leading a machines' rise against mankind), Skynet sends a T-800 Terminator to 1987 to kill Sarah, John's mother. Kyle, John's right-hand man, follows the T-800 and Sarah re-programmes it into "Pops" to form a team in a deadly adventure to destroy Genisys.(n)

programme.title: Skylines
programme.desc: With Earth becoming home to alien hybrids, the once-friendly aliens start turning on the humans due to a viral infection, leaving Captain Rose Corley and her team to take a perilous trip to the heart of an extraterrestrial planet in an attempt to save mankind.(n)

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.(n)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: 30 years after what happened in the first movie LAPD officer K finds a secret that could cause chaos to society. During his investigation he finds former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who was missing for 30 years.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula runs a high-end resort for monsters far away from the human world. The Count's monster-haven bubble is burst when a boy named Jonathan stumbles upon his resort and falls in love with his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: A famous lawyer, Mickey Haller, defends complex criminal cases in Los Angeles. Mickey runs the business his own way in his Lincoln, which tells that his business made him rich. Haller finds himself involved in the defense of the son of a wealthy businessman “Louis Roulet”, accused for rape and murder. A major conflict makes Haller not convinced of his client’s innocence. The lawyer turns into the investigator and opposes many influential persons’ attempts to mislead justice.

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a remote town near the edge of the magical land, Tristan promises his beloved that he will search for a fallen star for her, embarking on a journey of magical adventures in the process.

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: Dissatisfied with how God has guided his life, Bruce rages at heavens after a bad day, only for God to come down and bestow Bruce with divine power, issuing a challenge for him to do a better job with running the world if he thinks things are that easy.

programme.title: Logan Lucky
programme.desc: Brothers Jimmy and Clyde embark on a daring mission to pull off a robbery during a NASCAR race in North Carolina.

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, private investigator Holland March (Ryan Gosling) is forced to work with another private eye Jackson Healey (Russell Crowe) to investigate the mysterious death of a porn star and a missing girl.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: When the avid bowler Jeffrey "The Dude" Lebowski is mistaken for a millionaire who shares his last name, things spiral out of control when the millionaire enlists his help to deliver the ransom for his kidnapped wife.

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: With two simultaneous uncover operations intersect, an undercover cop that has joined the mob and a spy infiltrating the police force try to uncover the identity of the other mole before their own cover is blown.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: At 21, Tim's father (Bill Nighy) tells him all the men in the family have the ability to time travel. Tim uses his new skill to craft the perfect romance with the girl of his dreams (Rachel McAdams), but his unusual lifestyle comes with unexpected and tragic consequences.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.

programme.title: The Salesman
programme.desc: As they rehearse for Arthur Miller's Death of a Salesman, Rana and Emad's plans are interrupted by an assault on Rana in their new house. As the traumatized Rana tries to deal with the aftermath, Emad becomes focused on finding the person who hurt his wife.

programme.title: The Black Stallion
programme.desc: During a trip with his father, Alec becomes fascinated by an Arabian horse stabled on their ship. When the ship sinks and only Alec and the horse survive, a bond grows between them. Alec, along with horse trainer Henry Dailey, begin to train the horse to race against the fastest horses in the world.

programme.title: French Kiss
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé goes to Paris for a medical conference, he falls for another girl, which sends Kate after him to get him back. But when she ends up crossing paths with the thief Luc, her life turns upside down.

programme.title: The Rest of Us
programme.desc: When her ex-husband dies suddenly, Cami reluctantly steps in to help his new family after his death left them in a dire situation. Inviting them into her home, Cami and her daughter are left to try and deal with their feelings towards the newcomers, as well as their lingering grief.

programme.title: Rome in Love
programme.desc: With her dreams of being an actress about to come true, Amelia needs to keep the news of her casting as the lead in the remake of Roman Holiday under wraps. But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Rubin Carter is a middleweight boxer who managed to escape the tragedies and sufferings of his childhood. He is hopeful about the future, but his hopes are thwarted when he is accused of murder and imprisoned.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942 during World War II, Canadian intelligence officer, Max Vatan, is partnered with French Resistance fighter, Marianne Beausejour, in an assasination mission in Casablanca. They fall in love and get married in London after which Max is confronted with an allegation from his superiors that Marianne is a German spy and if proved to be true, Max must execute her. Defying the set plan, Max decides to find out the truth about his wife on his own and endangers his life and those who try to help him in the process.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: Nina Sayers is a ballerina whose dedication to playing a dual role in Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" starts to threaten her mental health as she starts having hallucinations.

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Rubin Carter is a middleweight boxer who managed to escape the tragedies and sufferings of his childhood. He is hopeful about the future, but his hopes are thwarted when he is accused of murder and imprisoned.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned by the brutal Civil war in Sudan that began in 1983, these young victims traveled as many as a thousand miles on foot in search of safety. Fifteen years later, a humanitarian effort would bring 3600 lost boys and girls to America.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two childhood best friends become enemies when their weddings coincide on the same day, and each of them refuses to postpone the ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: Professional chef Carl (Jon Favreau) quits his job at a popular Los Angeles restaurant and returns to his home town of Miami to fix up a food truck. He reconnects with his ex-wife (Sofía Vergara) and invites their young son to join him in driving the truck back to L.A.(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: After a sour breakup, Clementine and Joel undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memory, but while their minds are being swept clean from their shared past, Joel tries to hold onto one last memory to be their safe haven, hoping for the prospect of a new, future encounter.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A daring synthetic biologist, having lost his family in a car accident, will stop at nothing to bring them back, even if it means going up against a government-controlled laboratory and the physical laws of science.(n)

programme.title: Blue Story
programme.desc: Timmy and Marco are two best friends who go to the same high school, but their friendship is tested when they find themselves on opposing sides of a street war.(n)

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: DJay is a pimp who wants to turn his life around by creating rap music. He gets help from an old friend and tries to get the attention of a rap superstar to get him a record deal.(n)

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: In 1950s Soviet Russia, secret police agent Leo Demidov is exiled with his wife to a remote province where they join forces with Gen. Mikhail Nesterov to investigate the case of a serial killer who kills young boys, and in their quest reveals horrific secrets related to the political system itself.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S1
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. They're also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.

programme.title: Cheerleader Abduction
programme.desc: Olivia is a bright student and head of her school's cheerleading team who's harboring a scandalous secret. As Olivia starts pulling away from her mother, the latter grows concerned and sets about trying to get to the bottom of the matter, uncovering a shocking truth.

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.

programme.title: The War with Grandpa
programme.desc: When Peter's Grandpa comes to live with his family, he takes his room and Peter stays in the attic. Peter decides to declare war on his Grandpa to get his room back with the help of his friends.

programme.title: Leila's Brothers
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Leila discovers that she has spent her entire life caring for her family members who have been incurring debts, but as she finds her siblings struggling to make money, Leila comes up with a plan to work things out.

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: Belfast
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the lives of a little boy and his blue-collar family during the Northern Ireland conflict in the late sixties.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: As the celebrity power couple Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting ready to wed before a global audience of fans, things take a surprising turn when Kat finds out that Bastian cheated on her, so she chooses a stranger from the crowd named Charlie to marry instead.

programme.title: The Wheelers
programme.desc: A small group of friends who call themselves The Wheelers, ride the streets on their skateboards to protect their neighborhood from crime, meet a friendly alien on the run and decide to help him.

programme.desc: When his family moves to a new house, Little Brother has trouble adjusting as he seems unable to make any friends. However, he seems more than satisfied with the relationships he does have. Until a mysterious disappearance disturbs his idyllic life.

programme.title: Nur And The Dragon Temple
programme.desc: Nur and her parents move to China, where she makes new friends. While they're celebrating Guo's birthday in an amusement park, they discover that their friend is missing and they have to cross a maze and go through the nine gates of the dragon to find him.

programme.title: The Fairy Tales Tree

programme.desc: As they happily prepare food for a picnic, the two bears Brayer and Bramble are stopped by the two monkeys Tiky and Baboo who steal their food, while Vick hatches an evil plan to kidnap the animals of the forest.

programme.desc: As he's getting ready to meet the Crown Princess, Ploddy the Police Car comes across environmental criminals threatening rare animals.

programme.title: Khan Kluay 2

programme.desc: Strapped for cash for his girlfriend's surgery, Casey attempts an ill-fated drug heist for his old gangster boss. But when the heist lands him in trouble with a dangerous kingpin, he finds himself fighting to save his girlfriend, who was kidnapped by the kingpin.

programme.title: Salyut-7
programme.desc: In 1985, cosmonauts Vladimir Dzhanibekov and Viktor Savinykh undertake the most challenging mission in space exploration, when they attempt to dock the unmanned Soviet space station Salyut 7.

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: After the Wall Street broker Will and his son Danny witness the murder of a crooked police officer following a botched bank robbery, Will is forced to help the criminals recover the stolen money after they kidnap Danny.

programme.title: The Warrior Queen of Jhansi
programme.desc: The epic tale of the heroism of Rani of Jhansi, the Indian queen who became a fearless freedom fighter who led her people into battle against the British Empire in 1857.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Former presidential guard Mike Banning must step up when he finds himself in the White House in the midst of a terrorist attack. Only Banning has the inside knowledge national security forces will need to rescue the President from his kidnappers, and avert an even greater disaster.

programme.title: Shadow Dancer
programme.desc: In 1993, the IRA member Colette is arrested and a deal is made for her to work for the MI-5 as an informer. She accepts to protect her son but it not that simple as other tasks are asked by different officers.

programme.title: Twelve
programme.desc: A young drug dealer's life spirals out of control after his cousin gets murdered and his best friend is accused of the crime.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Rambo, a retired veteran who now catches snakes for local entertainers and chauffeurs locals for a living in Thailand, joins a team heading into war-torn Burma for a rescue mission.

programme.title: Decommissioned
programme.desc: Former agent John Niles gets in over his head as he finds out that he's the fall guy for an upcoming plot by the CIA to assassinate the president.

programme.title: The 2nd
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Vic Davis must race against time to save his son after a group of terrorists kidnap him along with the daughter of a Supreme Court Justice.

programme.title: Hands of Stone
programme.desc: The film revolves around the life of the famous boxer (Roberto Duran), where his career began at a very early age, playing for the world championship of average weight before the global boxer (Sugar Ray Leonard), and during the match surprised all the audience and all the viewers of the game by going to the corner of the ring and saying his famous words (not more).

programme.title: The Man with the Iron Heart
programme.desc: In 1942, during the peak of the third Reich, the Czech Resistance decides to pull one of the most ambitious and adventurous moves of WW2 by sending a group of soldiers in their late 20s to Prague to assassinate the most ruthless Nazi leader Reich-protector Reinhard Heydrich.

programme.title: S.M.A.R.T. Chase
programme.desc: When he gets ambushed during a mission to transport a precious Chinese antique, a private security agent must fight his way through brutal thugs to reclaim what he has lost; both the antique and his reputation.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Retired assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) unwillingly returns to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, but is faced with many challenges along the way, including a bounty that has been put on his life.

programme.title: The Lost City of Z
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film tells the story of British explorer Percy Fawcett who vanished back in 1925 after dedicating his life to proving that an advanced civilization had once existed in the jungles of Amazon.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: Journey’s End
programme.desc: During WWII, nerves fray as a company awaits an upcoming German attack that they desperately try to avoid thinking about, as their leader, Captain Stanhope, crumbles under the pressure and horror of war.

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: On her way back to New York after retrieving her husband's body, the grieving Kyle wakes up from a nap to find her 6-year-old daughter Julie missing. As she searches the plane for her daughter, everyone insists that Julie was never on the plane in the first place.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends, Cristina and Vicky, one more rooted in sensuality and the other in logic and routine, travel to Barcelona and meet the charming painter Juan Antonio who becomes involved with both of them. Also in the mix is his passionate and unstable ex-wife, Maria.

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: In an attempt to help her husband Eric cope with a traumatizing past, Patti encourages him to confront the Japanese officer who tortured him years ago, back when Eric was a prisoner of war during WWII.

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning
programme.desc: Strapped for cash to send her son to a private school, a single mother recruits her whimsical sister to start a crime scene clean-up service.

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Adapted from Nikolai Leskov's Lady Macbeth of the Mtsensk District, the movie depicts the life of a young woman stifled by her marriage of convenience to a man twice her age. Confined and left behind by her husband, she starts a romance with a young man from the estate.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: When Dodge's wife leaves him after the news of an asteroid nearing Earth break out, he decides that he wants to spend his final days trying to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Along for the ride is his neighbor Penny that accompanies him on a journey that will change both their lives.

programme.title: Witches in the Woods
programme.desc: A college girl abandons her studies to go on a snowboarding trip with her friends. With the temperature starting to fall, their trip becomes a literal witch hunt.

programme.desc: A cosmic event transforms Emma's dog and cat into two attractive young men, which drives her to reconsider her views on dating ,while she tries to overcome her own problems of self-confidence and, over time, learns to love herself.(c)

programme.desc: After Porter (Mel Gibson) and Val (Gregg Henry) pulled off a robbery, Val gets greedy and plots with Porter's wife to kill him and escape with the money. But when Porter survives their deadly ambush, his only goal is revenge his wife and friend after they betrayed him.

programme.title: Havana Darkness
programme.desc: Three friends travel to Havana, Cuba, to investigate the origins of a mysterious manuscript supposedly written by the famous American writer Ernest Hemingway; they find themselves in a deadly cat and mouse game after being trapped in an abandoned building in the town center.(c)

programme.title: The Last Emperor
programme.desc: The tale of China’s last emperor, Puyi, from his coronation at the age of two, to his subsequent fall from glory.(c)

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: On her way back to New York after retrieving her husband's body, the grieving Kyle wakes up from a nap to find her 6-year-old daughter Julie missing. As she searches the plane for her daughter, everyone insists that Julie was never on the plane in the first place.(c)

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Adapted from Nikolai Leskov's Lady Macbeth of the Mtsensk District, the movie depicts the life of a young woman stifled by her marriage of convenience to a man twice her age. Confined and left behind by her husband, she starts a romance with a young man from the estate.(c)

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: A cosmic event transforms Emma's dog and cat into two attractive young men, which drives her to reconsider her views on dating ,while she tries to overcome her own problems of self-confidence and, over time, learns to love herself.(c)

programme.title: Grand Piano
programme.desc: After developing stage fright and breaking down on-stage, up-and-coming pianist Tom Selznick (Elijah Wood) stopped playing for years. Now, in his comeback concert, as he is turning the page of his sheet music, he finds a message warning him that if he played one note wrong, he will die.(c)

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: When Dodge's wife leaves him after the news of an asteroid nearing Earth break out, he decides that he wants to spend his final days trying to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Along for the ride is his neighbor Penny that accompanies him on a journey that will change both their lives.(c)

programme.title: American Wrestler: The Wizard
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, an Iranian boy flees the violence in his home country and seeks refuge in the US, only to feel alienated by an unwelcome community. In a bid to fit in, he joins his school's floundering wrestling team, and promptly becomes its star player.(c)

programme.title: Permanent
programme.desc: Six unrelated people have to go back to the past to discover what has controlled them all these years. Sex, drugs, guns and the Lord have created a series of events that changed everyone.(c)

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: A cosmic event transforms Emma's dog and cat into two attractive young men, which drives her to reconsider her views on dating ,while she tries to overcome her own problems of self-confidence and, over time, learns to love herself.(c)

programme.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film follows the life of Mark Felt, pseudonymized "Deep Throat" who helped journalists uncover the true events of the Watergate scandal of 1974.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A hypochondriac working as a baggage handler at the airport, has to face his fears when he meets a teenage girl with a terminal illness, who asks him to help her carry out her eccentric bucket list.(c)

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby
programme.desc: Thirty-one-year-old Maggie Fitzgerald works at a restaurant, but dreams of becoming a famous boxer. She looks for a coach to train her, and lonely Frankie Dunn seems to be the right one to do the job.(c)

programme.title: An Education
programme.desc: Set in the 1960s London, Jenny Mellor is a bright 16-year-old who dreams of attending Oxford, but her life turns upside down when she meets the charming older man David Goldman, who introduces her to his glamorous life.(c)

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning
programme.desc: Strapped for cash to send her son to a private school, a single mother recruits her whimsical sister to start a crime scene clean-up service.(c)

programme.title: Witches in the Woods
programme.desc: A college girl abandons her studies to go on a snowboarding trip with her friends. With the temperature starting to fall, their trip becomes a literal witch hunt.(c)
